Class Bill

java.lang.Object
common.Bill
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bill extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a financial record of a transaction in the Bistro system. This class stores price details, discounts, and confirmation identifiers.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Bill

      public Bill(long billId, long confirmationCode, double baseAmount, double discountPercent, double finalAmount)
      Constructs a new Bill instance with complete transaction details. * @param billId The unique identifier for the bill.
      Parameters:
      confirmationCode - The unique code confirming the transaction.
      baseAmount - The original price before discounts.
      discountPercent - The discount rate applied (in percentage).
      finalAmount - The total amount to be paid after discount.

  • Method Details

    • getBillId

      public long getBillId()
      Gets the unique identifier of the bill. * @return The bill ID as a long.

    • getConfirmationCode

      public long getConfirmationCode()
      Gets the confirmation code linked to this bill's transaction. * @return The confirmation code as a long.

    • getBaseAmount

      public double getBaseAmount()
      Gets the initial amount of the bill before any discounts. * @return The base amount as a double.

    • getDiscountPercent

      public double getDiscountPercent()
      Gets the discount percentage applied to this bill. * @return The discount percent as a double.

    • getFinalAmount

      public double getFinalAmount()
      Gets the final calculated amount that the customer is charged. * @return The final amount as a double.
